mapper.select: select distinct a.stage_code, a.stage_name, a.stage_category, a.stage_type, a.stage_desc, a.sort_num, a.stage_id from bas_stage a inner join bas_stage_direction b on a.stage_id = b.stage_id and a.wh_id = b.wh_id where a.is_lock = 0 and (a.order_out_id is null or a.order_out_id <= 0) --@ and b.direction_id = #{direction_id} --@ and (a.pickup_type = #{pickup_type} or a.pickup_type is null or a.pickup_type = 0) --@ and (a.order_type = #{order_type} or a.order_type is null or a.order_type = 0) --@ and (a.biz_type = #{biz_type} or a.biz_type is null or a.biz_type = 0) --@ and a.wh_id = #{wh_id} --@ and a.owner_id = #{owner_id} order by a.sort_num
